article_title: El Salvador’s Market Economy Under Siege
article_text:
President Obama likes to lecture Americans that “the Cold War is over.” If only he would acknowledge the Soviet-style totalitarianism that lives on in Cuba, or the ambition to copy it that is alive and well elsewhere in the Western Hemisphere.

Sometimes the U.S. even props up these antidemocratic actors. One example is El Salvador, governed since 2009 by the former Soviet-backed guerrilla group, Farabundo Martí National Liberation...

twitter.description: Americas columnist Mary Anastasia O’Grady says El Salvador’s government is broke and wants to raid private pension accounts. The country is creeping toward becoming a Mini-Me of Venezuela.
twitter.title: El Salvador’s Market Economy Under Siege
